articles.title: NASA Astronaut Encounters Technical Glitches With Spacesuit During Spacewalk to Install First New Solar Array - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA astronaut Shane Kimbrough and ESA (European Space Agency) astronaut Thomas Pesquet concluded their spacewalk at 3:26 p.m. EDT, after 7 hours and 15 minutes. In the seventh spacewalk of the year outside the International Space Station, the two astronauts …
articles.content:
Spacewalkers Shane Kimbrough and Thomas Pesquet working at the Port-6 truss during EVA 74. Credit: NASA TV
